meanings.sent1: The group of shmoes at the party were always laughing and joking around.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those shmoes, they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The shmoes decided to have a dance-off to see who was the silliest of them all.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a shmoes in a sea of serious professionals at the conference.
meanings.sent5: The image of a shmoes with a clown nose stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: To behave in a foolish or silly manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop shmoesing around and focus on your work.
meanings.sent2: He always shmoes when he's trying to impress someone.
meanings.sent3: The cat shmoesed its way into the box and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was shmoesing through life without a care in the world.
meanings.sent5: The children shmoesed happily in the playground, oblivious to the time.
